Please investigate the example code and attempt to figure out what is causing 
this. This example worked at one time. Get SSQ to help you if you get stuck.

Bug in example. GC is being disposed after the widget has been
dispose. This is only a restriction in R2.0.

The correct thing to do is to destroy the GC in the SWT.Dispose
callback of the widget.
